CUSTOM_SECTIONS.ConfigureHint: Items with custom sections will automatically appear in their respective categories in the appropriate tab (Inventory, Features, or Spells) based on the item type. To assign a section to an item, edit the item and enter a section name in the Details tab.

EnableCustomSections.Name: Enable Custom Item Sections
EnableCustomSections.Hint: Allow items to be organized into custom sections in character sheets across different tabs

EnableGridInventory.Name: Grid Inventory View (icons only)
EnableGridInventory.Hint: Display inventory items as square icon tiles (names/details hidden; shown in tooltip). Applies to both default and custom sections.
